titleStmt.title: His Majesties proclamation forbidding all his loving subjects of the counties of Glocester, Somerset, and Wilts, to obey any warrants of the Earle of Stanford, Sir Edward Bainton, or any others commanding them to appeare with armes, without His Majesties expresse consent
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: At head of title: By the King.
"Given at our court at Oxford, the eight and twentieth day of December, in the eighteenth yeare of our reigne."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
